alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Southern Franklin; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 06 at 2:45AM EDT until July 06 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heat index values up to 96 expected. * WHERE...Central Interior Cumberland, Interior Waldo, Kennebec, Southern Somerset, androscoggin, and Southern Franklin Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Central Interior Cumberland; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Southern Franklin; Southern Somerset
